turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to order from Starbucks or Peet's Coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get one from Keith in Boulder, Colorado.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, the location at 1695 29th St Suite 1260.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! what can I get started for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get a large Golden Caffè Latte.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: with nonfat milk and an extra shot of espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Large Golden Caffè Latte, with skim milk and an extra shot. did I get it right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great! any sugars for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just the way it is is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: perfect! alright, is that all? can I send it over?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it. Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright, one moment please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're very welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a great day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Byebye.
